Name: Meteors
About the game: Meteors is a casual arcade indie shooter as well as a throw back to a simpler time in gaming. Control your spaceship using the arrow keys and fire missiles that drill into the core of Meteors and explode from within. Collect floating upgrades and challenge the games endless rounds to achieve the highest score you can. Includes a playable demo of Dragons, a new take on the classic game Snake.
Meta Title: Meteors: Dec 27, 2017, Bryan Baumeister and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Meteors? Check out the release date (Dec 27, 2017), developer insights from Bryan Baumeister, and a complete game summary.
